 II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵ֫דֶר‎</span> **proper name, masculine** (compare Nabataean proper name <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עדרו‎</span> = Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>337</sup>); — ==a Levite== [[1Chr.23.23|1Chr 23:23]]; [[1Chr.24.30|1Chr 24:30]], [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">Αιδαθ</span>, <span class="bdbLangGreek">Ηλα</span>, [[BDB#A|A]] [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]<sup>L</sup></lookup> <span class="bdbLangGreek">Εδερ</span>. 

 III. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵ֫דֶר‎</span> **proper name, of a location** ==in extreme south of Judah== [[Josh.15.21|Josh 15:21]], site unknown; [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">Αρα</span>, [[BDB#A|A]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">Εδραι</span>, [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]<sup>L</sup></lookup> <span class="bdbLangGreek">Εβερ</span>.
